name: PaintShop Pro Picture Frame File
summary: A PSPFRAME file contains a picture frame created by PaintShop Pro, an image editor for Windows. It stores a picture frame graphic that you can apply to an image. PSPFRAME graphics come in various styles, including oval, modern, and classic, with mats or photo edges.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: PSPFRAME file open in Corel PaintShop Pro 2023
images.alt: PSPFRAME file open in Corel PaintShop Pro 2023
